Classes in oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.common used by oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.common
ApplRole
           
ApplSession
          Historically, the Context object has been the main window through which product teams access AOL/J functionality - it provided security API's and access to database connections and services like profiles and messages.
ApplSessionAttribute
          Apps-specific implementation of LwsSessionAttribute
ApplSessionManagement
          The ApplSessionManagement class implements the LwsSessionContext interface, and handles all aspects of LwsSession management, including creating, attaching to, validating, and destroying the session object.
ApplSessionNamespace
          The ApplSessionNamespace contains the attribute-value pairs of a given namespace for a given session.
ApplUser
